post:
HostBastic Debuts with Shared Hosting in France Starting at $12/year!

france, hostbastic, shared January 5, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Thinking up a name for a hosting company has to be tough – so many nounhost, verbhost, nounhosting, and verbhosting names, not to mention nonsense names (you know the kind I mean).  Perhaps all the good names were used up long ago?

Not so!  Here’s HostBastic, a fun and unique name if I ever heard one.  They’ve been posted on our sister site LowEndTalk since 2016 and are dropping their first offer here on LEB.  Welcome, lads!

They’re a UK company with a non-outsourced European support team that offers “24 hour response, 48 hour resolution” response time on issues.

In this offer they’re bringing us some cPanel-based shared offers, starting as low as $12/year!

Here’s what they had to say for themselves:

“HostBastic started offering services to the low end community on LowEndTalk back in October 2016. We specialize in high end shared and reseller performance hosting with the implementation of latest technologies and newer generation hardware. We are a team of hosting experts which has only one goal in mind, to deliver top quality hosting services, customer satisfaction is our number one priority. Our team is based out of Europe and 100% english speaking. We don’t outsource! You will always get quality service and support with us.”

If you’re interested in taking HostBastic for a spin, check out their terms of service and if you’re good to go, you can pay with PayPal, Debit/Credit Card, BitCoin, AliPay, Unionpay, WebMoney, SOFORT Banking, iDeal, Bancontact, and DOKU.

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!
